response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is worth far more than its price tag. Considering the immense value this product holds for you, I propose a transaction where you can purchase it for $1,200,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, ensuring that you secure a valuable asset at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing me to achieve a significant return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially closing this deal with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
